short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Better meetings for you and your team

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of terrible meetings? A 10X better Calendar Experience. 

- Use templates to add an agenda to every meeting
- Add desired outcomes to every meeting
- Register the notes of your meetings
- Find all meeting notes related with a tag
- Attendees can vote on how well the meeting achieved the desired outcomes
- Organiser can request actions from attendees (pre-read, upload...)
- Display the costs of every meeting

Better meetings for you and your team. Ask attendees to do their homework, increase accountability, add feedback loops, give visibility of the status and encourage participation. Give it a try!

Changelog:

- ✅ If the meeting has a Zoom call, you can join directly
- ✅ New style for the options page
- ✅ You can enable or disable the "Display cost of meeting" feature
- ✅ When displaying the cost, it correctly rounds the total cost figure
- ✅ Fix: popup correctly displays the date for the Next Meeting
- ✅ Fix: removes flickering option in the selection
- ✅ Fix: extension options are displayed without the need to login
